title: Wild
description: Asmita's debut as a Published Poet was at the age of 10 years in a National Anthology "Creative Communications". She contributed to their collection for 3 years in a row. After a brief hiatus, she compiled her First Collection of Poetry as an Independent Author. We, Parents of Asmita, are delighted to share her beautiful thoughts in this book "Wild" with all.In this poetry collection, a teenager explores themes of identity and being different. She illustrates how life subdues everyone's Wild side eventually......................
author: Asmita Sharma
